name: Scandinavian Mountains
hint: A mountain range running along the Scandinavian Peninsula through Norway and Sweden

name: Alps
hint: The highest and most extensive mountain range in Europe, stretching across eight countries

name: Black Forest
hint: A large forested mountain range in southwestern Germany, known for its dense evergreen forests

name: Carpathian Mountains
hint: A mountain range forming an arc across Central and Eastern Europe through Romania, Slovakia, and Ukraine

name: Great Hungarian Plain
hint: One of the largest flat plains in Europe, covering much of Hungary and parts of neighboring countries

name: Iberian Meseta
hint: A central plateau covering most of the interior of Spain and Portugal

name: Scottish Highlands
hint: A historic region of Scotland with rugged mountain terrain, lochs, and glens

name: Finnish Lakeland
hint: A region in central Finland with tens of thousands of lakes, the largest lake district in Europe
